image.name: SHM-001.jpg
image.title: 1922. Lake Forest Park School
image.caption: 1922. Lake Forest Park School. More details in Barbara Bender's book "Growing Up in Lake Forest Park."

image.name: SHM-002.jpg
image.title: 1978. Pioneer Luncheon
image.caption: April 12, 1978. Pioneer Luncheon given by Shoreline Historical Museum at the Ronald School.

image.name: SHM-005-A.jpg
image.title: 1908. Richmond Beach Baseball team, the Strawberry Huskers
image.caption: 1908. Richmond Beach Baseball Team, the Strawberry Huskers. L-to-R Top: Red Wilde, manager, Henry Murray, Walter Taylor. Middle: George Holloway, John Walloch, Herb Voight, Chuck Taylor. Bottom: Bill Taylor, Jack Cusick, Grove Voreis.

image.name: SHM-005-B.jpg
image.title: 1908. Richmond Beach Baseball team, the Strawberry Huskers
image.caption: 1908. Richmond Beach Baseball Team, the Strawberry Huskers. L to R- Top: Red Wilde, manager, Henry Murray, Walter Taylor. Middle: George Holloway, John Walloch, Herb Voight, Chuck Taylor. Bottom: Bill Taylor, Jack Cusick, Grove Voreis.

image.name: SHM-009.jpg
image.title: Circa 1911. Ronald Methodist Church Picnic
image.caption: Circa 1911. Ronald Methodist Church annual picnic at Richmond Beach.

image.name: SHM-010.jpg
image.title: No date. Richmond Highlands Lumber Co.
image.caption: Richmond Highlands Lumber Company. Dunn Lumber at 185th and Aurora.

image.name: SHM-011.jpg
image.title: Before 1920. Ronald School softball team
image.caption: Pre 1920. Boys and Girls Softball team.

image.name: SHM-012.jpg
image.title: 1912. Rogers Store, 185th and Aurora Ave
image.caption: 1912. Richmond Highlands Grocery Store owned by Mr. and Mrs. Rogers. Located at 185th and Aurora.

image.name: SHM-014.jpg
image.title: 1908-09. Ronald School 3rd grade
image.caption: 1908-09. Last year of one-room Ronald School.

image.name: SHM-015.jpg
image.title: 1923. Ronald Baseball Team
image.caption: 1923. Ronald Baseball Team managed by Mr. Parsons.

image.name: SHM-016.jpg
image.title: 1931. Ronald Band Class
image.caption: 1931. Herb Haines is the boy first row - first left.

image.name: SHM-019.jpg
image.title: 1910-11. Ronald School
image.caption: 1910-11. Miss Coffield, teacher. Note student wearing a shoe brace.

image.name: SHM-020.jpg
image.title: 1962. Highland Ice Arena on Aurora
image.caption: August 1962. Construction of Highland Ice Arena on Aurora Avenue in August 1962.
